targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp_represent AS "time",
  country_id AS "name",
  cases AS "Fallzahlen"
FROM grafana
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp_represent) AND
  location_type = 'country'
ORDER BY timestamp_represent

SELECT
  timestamp_represent AS "time",
  incidence_7day AS "7-Tages-Inzidenz"
FROM grafana
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp_represent) and
  location_type = case
    when $selected_location != 'any' then 'location'
    when $selected_district != 'any' then 'district'
    when $selected_state != 'any' then 'state'
    when $selected_country != 'any' then 'country'
    else 'continent'
  end and
  1 = IF ($selected_continent != 'any', continent_name = $selected_continent, 1) and
  1 = IF ($selected_country != 'any', country_name = $selected_country, 1) and
  1 = IF ($selected_state != 'any', state_name = $selected_state, 1) and
  1 = IF ($selected_district != 'any', district_name = $selected_district, 1) and
  1 = IF ($selected_location != 'any', location_name = $selected_location, 1) and
  flag_disabled = 0 and flag_deleted = 0
ORDER BY timestamp_represent

SELECT
  timestamp_represent AS "time",
  beds_free AS "Freie Intensivbetten",
  beds_occupied AS "Belegte Intensivbetten",
  beds_total AS "Intensivbetten gesamt",
  cases_covid AS "Patienten mit COVID",
  cases_covid_ventilated AS "Beatmungspflichtige Patienten"
FROM divis LEFT JOIN locations ON divis.locations_uid = locations.uid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp_represent) and
  location_type = 'district' and
  1 = IF ($selected_continent != 'any', locations.continent_name = $selected_continent, 1) and
  1 = IF ($selected_country != 'any', locations.country_name = $selected_country, 1) and
  1 = IF ($selected_state != 'any', locations.state_name = $selected_state, 1) and
  1 = IF ($selected_district != 'any', locations.district_name = $selected_district, 1) and
  1 = IF ($selected_location != 'any', locations.location_name = $selected_location, 1) and
  locations.flag_disabled = 0 and locations.flag_deleted = 0
ORDER BY timestamp_represent

  1 = IF ($selected_district != 'any', locations.district_name = $selected_district, 1) and
  1 = IF ($selected_location != 'any', locations.location_name = $selected_location, 1) and
  locations.flag_disabled = 0 and locations.flag_deleted = 0
GROUP BY gender, age_group_lower, age_group_upper
ORDER BY age_group_lower

SELECT 
timestamp_reported as "time", 
IF (CONCAT(age_group_lower, '-', age_group_upper) = '-1--1', '?', CONCAT(age_group_lower, '-', age_group_upper)) as "name",
SUM(testresults.deaths_count) as deaths_count
FROM `testresults` LEFT JOIN locations ON testresults.locations_uid = locations.uid
WHERE 
 $__timeFilter(timestamp_reported) and
  1 = IF ($selected_continent != 'any', locations.continent_name = $selected_continent, 1) and
  1 = IF ($selected_country != 'any', locations.country_name = $selected_country, 1) and
  1 = IF ($selected_state != 'any', locations.state_name = $selected_state, 1) and
  1 = IF ($selected_district != 'any', locations.district_name = $selected_district, 1) and
  1 = IF ($selected_location != 'any', locations.location_name = $selected_location, 1) and
  locations.flag_disabled = 0 and locations.flag_deleted = 0
GROUP BY gender, age_group_lower, age_group_upper
ORDER BY age_group_lower

SELECT 
timestamp_reported as "time", 
IF (CONCAT(age_group_lower, '-', age_group_upper) = '-1--1', '?', CONCAT(age_group_lower, '-', age_group_upper)) as "name",
(100 / SUM(testresults.cases_count) * SUM(testresults.deaths_count)) as deaths_rate
FROM `testresults` LEFT JOIN locations ON testresults.locations_uid = locations.uid
WHERE 
 $__timeFilter(timestamp_reported) and
  1 = IF ($selected_continent != 'any', locations.continent_name = $selected_continent, 1) and

GROUP BY gender, age_group_lower, age_group_upper
ORDER BY age_group_lower

SELECT 
timestamp_reported as "time", 
if (age_group_upper >= 0 AND age_group_upper < 999, ((age_group_upper + age_group_lower) / 2), age_group_lower) as "Altersschnitt"
FROM `testresults` LEFT JOIN locations ON testresults.locations_uid = locations.uid
WHERE 
  1 = IF ($selected_continent != 'any', locations.continent_name = $selected_continent, 1) and

  1 = IF ($selected_location != 'any', locations.location_name = $selected_location, 1) and
  locations.flag_disabled = 0 and locations.flag_deleted = 0 and
 $__timeFilter(timestamp_reported)
GROUP BY age_group_lower, age_group_upper
ORDER BY SUM(testresults.cases_count) ASC

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp_represent AS "time",
  state_name AS "name",
  SUM(cases) AS cases
FROM grafana
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp_represent) and 
  location_type = 'district' and 
  $selected_country = 'Germany' and 
  1 = IF($selected_state != 'any', state_name != $selected_state, 1) and
  flag_disabled = 0 and 
  flag_deleted = 0
GROUP BY state_hash
ORDER BY state_name

SELECT
  timestamp_represent AS "time",
  state_name AS "name",
  SUM(recovered) AS recovered
FROM grafana
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp_represent) and
  location_type = 'district' and 
  $selected_country = 'Germany' and 
  1 = IF($selected_state != 'any', state_name != $selected_state, 1) and
  flag_disabled = 0 and 
  flag_deleted = 0
GROUP BY state_hash
ORDER BY state_name

SELECT
  timestamp_represent AS "time",
  state_name AS "name",
  SUM(deaths) AS deaths
FROM grafana
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp_represent) and
  location_type = 'district' and 
  $selected_country = 'Germany' and 
  1 = IF($selected_state != 'any', state_name != $selected_state, 1) and
  flag_disabled = 0 and 
  flag_deleted = 0
GROUP BY state_hash
ORDER BY state_name

SELECT
  timestamp_represent AS "time",
  state_name AS "name",
  (100 / SUM(cases) * SUM(deaths)) AS deaths_rate
FROM grafana
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp_represent) and
  location_type = 'district' and 
  $selected_country = 'Germany' and 
  1 = IF($selected_state != 'any', state_name != $selected_state, 1) and
  flag_disabled = 0 and 
  flag_deleted = 0
GROUP BY state_hash
ORDER BY state_name

options.content:
Impressum · Datenschutz · Haftungsausschluss · Quellcode
Diese OpenSource-Software bezieht ihre Daten aus den offiziellen Quellen vom Robert-Koch-Institut, der EU und dem Covid-19-Data Projekt von OWID auf Github.
Alle statistischen Angaben zum Corona Virus, zur Pandemie, ihrer Entwicklung oder ihrem Verlauf, zu Covid-19 und allen damit verbundenen Zahlen, ohne Gewähr.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp_last_update AS "time",
  uid
FROM infocasts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp_last_update)
ORDER BY timestamp_last_update

SELECT
  if (isnull(timestamp_represent), NOW(), timestamp_represent) AS "time",
  if (isnull(timestamp_last_update), UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()), UNIX_TIMESTAMP(MAX(timestamp_last_update)) * 1000) as "timestamp"
FROM grafana
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp_represent) and
  location_type = case
    when $selected_location != 'any' then 'location'
    when $selected_district != 'any' then 'district'
    when $selected_state != 'any' then 'state'
    when $selected_country != 'any' then 'country'
    else 'continent'
  end and
  1 = IF ($selected_continent != 'any', continent_name = $selected_continent, 1) and
  1 = IF ($selected_country != 'any', country_name = $selected_country, 1) and
  1 = IF ($selected_state != 'any', state_name = $selected_state, 1) and
  1 = IF ($selected_district != 'any', district_name = $selected_district, 1) and
  1 = IF ($selected_location != 'any', location_name = $selected_location, 1) and
  flag_disabled = 0 and flag_deleted = 0
ORDER BY timestamp_represent
